name: World of Arrow
description:
World of Arrow is a 2D action-adventure game for the android platform.

Drawn onto the paper by a pen. Try to escape your destiny and find a way out before the rubber gets you. But be careful! There are dangers everywhere.

The game will test your coordination and your timing. You can control the moving direction of the character with only two buttons.

The game contains a little tutorial and five worlds with different themes. Collect every coin and unlock the secret boss level.

I hope you enjoy exploring the "World of Arrow"!

At the moment there is only a build for the android platform available. But I have planned to add a PC-version for this game, where you can use the cursor-buttons to change the moving direction.

Programming, art and music by Alexander Ebel (Faty Games)
